channel.title: Feather Monero Wallet in Whonix-Workstation
channel.description:
Hi, I was just playing around a little bit with feather monero wallet...I connected it through 10.152.152.10:9111 (just like I would with electrum)...it seemed to work really fine...looking at the circuits it seemed as if it was only connecting to onion-adresses (unlike to the regular monero-gui)... Is that something worth exploring or are there any security implications I currently do not see...
BTW I was running the appimage...

item.title: Feather Monero Wallet in Whonix-Workstation
item.dc:creator: whonixfriend
item.description:
As far as I understood it, the traffic went through sys-whonix…I did not see any tor over tor scenario…
But then again I am not an expert…just started playing around with it…

Read full topic

item.title: Feather Monero Wallet in Whonix-Workstation
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Do not Allow Tor over Tor Scenarios

Whonix – 5 Dec 21

Dev/anon-ws-disable-stacked-tor

Preventing Tor over Tor for Tor Browser, TorChat and others.

  • Limitations

Read full topic

item.title: Feather Monero Wallet in Whonix-Workstation
item.dc:creator: whonixfriend
item.description:
Hi,
I was just playing around a little bit with feather monero wallet…I connected it through 10.152.152.10:9111 (just like I would with electrum)…it seemed to work really fine…looking at the circuits it seemed as if it was only connecting to onion-adresses (unlike to the regular monero-gui)…
Is that something worth exploring or are there any security implications I currently do not see…

BTW I was running the appimage…
